signals.detail: Caller claims to be from Amazon Customer Service
Creates artificial time pressure by asking to press 1 now
Classic customer service scam script with urgency and authority impersonation

audio_analysis.transcript_summary: Caller impersonates Amazon Customer Service, creates urgency to press 1, and mentions suspicious activity on the account.
audio_analysis.recommendation: Do not press 1. Hang up and contact Amazon directly through their official website or customer service number to verify the legitimacy of the call.
